name: Poseidon
description: Poseidon, god of the sea and quakes, presides over tides, storms, and tremors. He can summon towering surges or calm the waters.

skills.name: Raging Tide
skills.description: Gains 200 Energy upon entering battle. (Unlock at Relic Lv.1)

upgrades.level2: Poseidon casts Rogue Wave upon entering battle, but it deals 50% reduced DMG. (Unlock at Relic Lv.10)
upgrades.level3: Now deals 80% of DMG. (Unlock at Relic Lv.20)
upgrades.level4: Casting Rogue Wave resets the CD of Waterspout. (Unlock at Relic Lv.30)

skills.name: Rogue Wave
skills.description: Poseidon raises his trident, summoning two tidal waves on both sides of the battlefield. Enemies within range are pushed 2 meters and take DMG equal to 200% of his ATK.

upgrades.level2: When the two tidal waves meet in the middle, they create a violent swell, knocking down enemies at the center and dealing additional DMG equal to 100% of ATK.

skills.name: Waterspout
skills.description: Poseidon drives his trident into the ground under the current target, triggering a tidal wave that deals DMG equal to 200% of ATK to enemies in a small area and knocking them down.

upgrades.level3: Also reduces the target's M-RES by 20%.

skills.name: Tidal Trident
skills.description: After every two attacks, Poseidon charges his trident. The next attack deals DMG equal to 200% of ATK to the target and restores 100 Energy to himself.

upgrades.level4: Grants him a shield equal to 200% of ATK. (Unlocks at Lv.261)

relic.name: Tidal Aegis
relic.description: Poseidon gathers the ocean energy, gaining a shield equal to 270% of ATK for 5s.

upgrades.level3: Increases ATK by 10% while the shield is active.
upgrades.level4: Shield Strength increases to 330%. (Unlocks at Lv.281)
